messages.title: Ways to get in touch
messages.content: Britain has come through the most dramatic global recession in a generation, but because of the active role taken by families, businesses and the Labour Government, the results of failure have been a lot less than in the 1980s and 1990s recessions. Now we have to secure and build the recovery, which needs a tough plan to halve the deficit in four years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backed by a tax on bankers' bonuses. Not Tory job cuts that risk the recovery.
Linking pensions to earnings and backing Sure Start.
A new top tax for very high earners, not Tory tax cuts for millionaires' estates.
Protect community policing and make sure they spend at least 80% of time on the beat.
Will continue to campaign for the Wesfield shopping centre.

issues.economy: Britain has come through the most dramatic global recession in a generation... we have to secure and build the recovery, which needs a tough plan to halve the deficit in four years.
issues.socialWelfare: Support for pensioners and families - Linking pensions to earnings and backing Sure Start.

leaflet.personalStatement: We have an important choice to make at this election.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Paul Meszaros on behalf of Marsha Singh both at 3rd floor, 76 Kirkgate, Bradford.
